author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Forced license changes don't usually play out well and that's what happened in the Redis situation a year back but I realized that I'd never actually gone and covered out, considering Arch dropped the package in favor of Valkey recently, now is as good a time as any.

Blog Post:
title: Forced Software License Changes Never Work
